movie.title: Bronson
movie.plot: A young man who was sentenced to 7 years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending 30 years in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter ego, Charles Bronson.

events.title: Charles Bronson steals an engagement ring for his girlfriend
Charles Bronson is arrested and sent back to prison
